creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: hanging scroll with two images on paper; top: text; bottom: scene with 2 women, 6 men, 1 at center of image at head of rectangular table, 3 others at either side of table
dimension: 55 7/8 x 16 1/16 in. (141.9 x 40.8 cm) (overall, without roller)
title: Eight Immortals of the Wine Cup, from a set of four
